channel.title: Ryzen on Dave Svatora
channel.description: Recent content in Ryzen on Dave Svatora

item.title: Mini ITX
item.description: It started off with just upgrading the i3 processor… …and turned into a bad a$$ custom built machine you can’t get anywhere. My first debate was to buy a 3 year old i7 for ~$300 or get a fairly new Ryzen 5 with 6 cores and 12 threads for half the cost. I’ve been an AMD fan for years but didn’t have good experiences with bulldozer or the Ryzen 5 2400G (Didn’t play well with Linux).
